title: Muhsin Ciftci
text:
Hello!
I am a Ph.D. candidate in Economics at Goethe University Frankfurt School of Economics. My research interests lie within the intersection of international macroeconomics, climate change, and applied econometrics. I further analyze the textual data using machine learning techniques and combine it with conventional macroeconometric models in my research.
Before joining Goethe University Frankfurt, I received a Master of Science in Economics from Middle East Technical University, and at the same time, I worked as a researcher at the Central Bank of Turkey. I received a Bachelor of Arts in Economics from Bogazici University.





International Macroeconomics
Applied Econometrics
Analysis of Textual Data
